thread.title: ICYMI: Meet the 50 on Fire Judges on Nov. 5th
thread.title_full: ICYMI: Meet the 50 on Fire Judges on Nov. 5th

author: Christine Healy
title: ICYMI: Meet the 50 on Fire Judges on Nov. 5th
text:
Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here by Friday, Oct. 23rd! 
50 on Fire is taking over The Howard Theatre on December 10th from 7 to 10 p.m. and we'll be celebrating the city's hottest innovators. Nominations are open now until the end of the day on Friday, Oct. 23rd. Don't wait to tell us which companies and individuals are heating up their industries. Nominate here! 
Before the big night, we're bringing nominees and judges together for Meet the Judges Meetups. Your next chance to meet and pitch the judges is Thursday Nov. 5th at 1777 North Kent in Rosslyn from 6 to 8 p.m. Get your ticket, which includes delicious food and drinks, here ! Three attendees will have the chance to pitch the judges and convince the crowd why they should be dubbed on fire . Sam Cicotello , Shana Glenzer , Donna Harris , Bobby Ocampo , Cary Hatch , and Patricia Tang will all be in attendance ready to meet this year's finalists. When you arrive at the event, drop your business card at check in for a chance to pitch. Can't join us on Nov. 5th? Don't worry, just save the date for our final Meet the Judges Meetup on Nov. 19th. Or purchase a VIP series pass and attend both events! 
Know a company or individual setting fire to their scene? Submit a nomination now . 50 on Fire main event tickets are available here and Meet the Judges Meetup tickets are available here or below. Want to align your brand with 50 on Fire and DC Inno events? Click here for more information.
